title: You can now pay Twitter to change the Android app’s homescreen icon
content:
Twitter dove into the subscription business last year with the launch of Twitter Blue, a pretty cheap monthly subscription that offers a few additional features for the service. Now, months after iOS, Twitter Blue is finally gaining the ability to change the look of the Twitter app’s homescreen icon.

more…

The post You can now pay Twitter to change the Android app’s homescreen icon appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Months after bringing the feature to iOS, Twitter Blue is finally letting Android users change the app's homescreen icon.
